name: Dave Oluwafemi
title: Full Stack Developer & General Manager
subtitle: PHP • Laravel • JavaScript • MySQL • Multi-Language Systems
location: Lagos, Nigeria (Open to Remote Roles Globally)

summary.title: Professional Summary
summary.content:
Full Stack Developer with 7+ years of hands-on experience building enterprise-grade web applications, financial platforms, e-commerce solutions, and multi-language business systems. General Manager at Endless Pro Solutions, leading development of advanced digital systems including micro-loan platforms, courier management systems, fintech dashboards, and international business websites supporting 6-18 languages per project.

Specialized in PHP 8.2+, Laravel, MySQL, and modern web technologies. Proven expertise in delivering scalable, secure, and high-performance applications for banking, logistics, e-commerce, and enterprise infrastructure sectors. Strong background in API integrations, payment systems, real-time tracking, and GDPR-compliant solutions.

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.skills: PHP 8.2+, Laravel, MySQL 8.0, RESTful APIs, Microservices, PDO, MVC Architecture, Server Management

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.skills: JavaScript ES6+, Bootstrap 5, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3, Responsive Design, UI/UX Implementation

database.title: Database & Infrastructure
database.skills: MySQL, Redis, Database Design, Query Optimization, cPanel, Linux, Apache, Nginx

security.title: Security & Compliance
security.skills: JWT Authentication, CSRF Protection, Encryption, GDPR Compliance, SQL Injection Prevention

integration.title: Integration & APIs
integration.skills: Payment Gateways (Stripe, PayPal), SMS/Email APIs, WhatsApp Integration, Third-party APIs

tools.title: Tools & Management
tools.skills: Git, GitHub, Docker, Composer, Project Management, SEO, Multi-language i18n

jobs.title: General Manager & Lead Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Lead development team in creating 10+ enterprise web applications for international clients
Architected and developed production systems supporting 6-18 languages each
Built secure banking systems handling sensitive financial transactions with enterprise-grade security
Developed high-volume email platforms processing 50M+ emails monthly
Created real-time tracking systems for logistics and courier operations
Implemented GDPR-compliant loan management systems with document handling
Managed full project lifecycle from requirements gathering to production deployment
Integrated payment gateways, SMS/WhatsApp APIs, and third-party services

items.name: SecureBank Pro - Multi-Language Banking System
items.tech: PHP 8.2+, MySQL, Bootstrap 5, 13 Languages, Enterprise Security
items.description: Complete banking platform with account management, transactions, admin console, and multi-language support for international deployment.

items.institution: Osun State College of Technology, Esa-Oke
